attributes.action: Prioritise carers of vulnerable people to receive a Covid vaccine when available
attributes.background: After medical staff, non-medical carers of vulnerable people should receive a Covid vaccine among the first, including spouses, children, other dedicated helpers. These people are economically active, they need to go to work, they can bring the disease to those they care for if not vaccinated.
